title: Product of the Number of Options
text: To find the total number of outcomes, find the product of the number of tossing a coin outcomes and the number of rolling a 6-sided die outcomes.

title: Tossing a Coin Outcomes
text: There are $$2$$ outcomes in a coin toss: heads or tails.

title: Rolling a 6-Sided Die Outcomes
text: There are $$6$$ outcomes to rolling a 6-sided die because there are $$6$$ sides.

title: Add the Number of Options
text: # of tossing a coin outcomes+# of rolling a 6-sided die outcomes\n$$2\times6=12$$
